thread.title: A bit pricey but a wonderful stay!!
thread.title_full: A bit pricey but a wonderful stay!! - Review of Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: TravelerKay
title: A bit pricey but a wonderful stay!!
text: Like everything in New York - this hotel is expensive - with that it is a wonderful small property - with a great location only a block from Grand Central. The rooms are small - but very well appointed with everything you need. The staff was very good - especially the breakfast attendant who did an amazing job of giving great customer service while being very busy. The breakfasts were wonderful. We were only able to partake of the wine and cheese reception but it was a plus as well.
